        Constructor function which initializes the girl,boy and the gift list
        Parameters:
        args - Command line argument to accept file names and value of k
        g - List of girls
        b - List of boys
        u - List of utility gifts
        l - List of luxury gifts
        e - List of essential gifts
        commit - Array to store the mapping of committed boys and girls
        c - List of couples made
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Gives IO Exception on wrong arguments
